Package com.fdmgroup.ItemsTracker.controller

Class ItemController

java.lang.Object
com.fdmgroup.ItemsTracker.controller.ItemController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/location/area") public class ItemController extends Object
The controller class that handle CRUD operation for item.
